price: Дедилар: «Парвардигоримиз билади. Биз сизларга аниқ пайғамбарлармиз.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
